verses.verse: בְּרֵאשִׁ֗ית <S%H7225><s%> In the beginning מַמְלֶ֛כֶת <S%H4467><s%> of the reign יְהוֹיָקִ֥ם <S%H3079><s%> of Jehoiakim בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יֹאושִׁיָּ֖הוּ <S%H2977><s%> of Josiah מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king יְהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah הָיָ֞ה <S%H1961><s%> came הַדָּבָ֤ר <S%H1697><s%> came this word הַזֶּה֙ <S%H2088><s%> this אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> to יִרְמְיָ֔ה <S%H3414><s%> unto Jeremiah מֵאֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3069><s%> God לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַ֤ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֵלַ֔י <S%H413><s%> to me עֲשֵׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> to me Make לְךָ֔ מוֹסֵר֖וֹת <S%H4147><s%> thee bonds וּמֹט֑וֹת <S%H4133><s%> and yokes וּנְתַתָּ֖ם <S%H5414><s%> and put עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on צַוָּארֶֽךָ׃ <S%H6677><s%> them upon thy neck

וְשִׁלַּחְתָּם֩ <S%H7971><s%> And send אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about מֶ֨לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> them to the king אֱד֜וֹם <S%H123><s%> of Edom וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> and to the king מוֹאָ֗ב <S%H4124><s%> of Moab וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֶ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H4428><s%> and to the king בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> of the sons עַמּ֔וֹן <S%H5983><s%> of Ammon וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> and to the king צֹ֖ר <S%H6865><s%> of Tyrus וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and to מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> and to the king צִיד֑וֹן <S%H6721><s%> of Zidon בְּיַ֤ד <S%H3027><s%> by the hand מַלְאָכִים֙ <S%H4397><s%> of the messengers הַבָּאִ֣ים <S%H935><s%> which come יְרוּשָׁלִַ֔ם <S%H3389><s%> to Jerusalem אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to צִדְקִיָּ֖הוּ <S%H6667><s%> unto Zedekiah מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king יְהוּדָֽה׃ <S%H3063><s%> of Judah

וְצִוִּיתָ֣ <S%H6680><s%> And command אֹתָ֔ם <S%H853><s%> אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about אֲדֹֽנֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H113><s%> unto their masters לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> them to say כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֞ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD צְבָאוֹת֙ <S%H6635><s%> of hosts אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel כֹּ֥ה <S%H3541><s%> thus תֹֽאמְר֖וּ <S%H559><s%> Thus shall ye say אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אֲדֹֽנֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H113><s%> unto your masters

אָנֹכִ֞י <S%H595><s%> I עָשִׂ֣יתִי <S%H6213><s%> I have made אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָ֗רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the earth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָדָ֤ם <S%H120><s%> the man וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַבְּהֵמָה֙ <S%H929><s%> and the beast אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> which עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> are on פְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> that [are] upon הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the ground בְּכֹחִי֙ <S%H3581><s%> power הַגָּד֔וֹל <S%H1419><s%> by my great וּבִזְרוֹעִ֖י <S%H2220><s%> arm הַנְּטוּיָ֑ה <S%H5186><s%> and by my outstretched וּנְתַתִּ֕יהָ <S%H5414><s%> and have given לַאֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> who יָשַׁ֥ר <S%H3474><s%> meet בְּעֵינָֽי׃ <S%H5869><s%> it unto whom it seemed

וְעַתָּ֗ה <S%H6258><s%> Now אָֽנֹכִי֙ <S%H595><s%> I נָתַ֙תִּי֙ <S%H5414><s%> And now have I given אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָאֲרָצ֣וֹת <S%H776><s%> all these lands הָאֵ֔לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these בְּיַ֛ד <S%H3027><s%> into the hand נְבוּכַדְנֶאצַּ֥ר <S%H5019><s%> of Nebuchadnezzar מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> the king בָּבֶ֖ל <S%H894><s%> of Babylon עַבְדִּ֑י <S%H5650><s%> my servant וְגַם֙ <S%H1571><s%> also אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חַיַּ֣ת <S%H2416><s%> and the beasts הַשָּׂדֶ֔ה <S%H7704><s%> of the field נָתַ֥תִּי <S%H5414><s%> have I given ל֖וֹ לְעָבְדֽוֹ׃ <S%H5647><s%> him also to serve

וְעָבְד֤וּ <S%H5647><s%> shall serve אֹתוֹ֙ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All הַגּוֹיִ֔ם <S%H1471><s%> And all nations וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנ֖וֹ <S%H1121><s%> him and his son וְאֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> and his son's בְּנ֑וֹ <S%H1121><s%> son עַ֣ד <S%H5704><s%> until בֹּא־ <S%H935><s%> come עֵ֤ת <S%H6256><s%> until the very time אַרְצוֹ֙ <S%H776><s%> of his land גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> again ה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> he וְעָ֤בְדוּ <S%H5647><s%> shall serve בוֹ֙ גּוֹיִ֣ם <S%H1471><s%> nations רַבִּ֔ים <S%H7227><s%> and then many וּמְלָכִ֖ים <S%H4428><s%> kings גְּדֹלִֽים׃ <S%H1419><s%> and great

וְהָיָ֨ה <S%H1961><s%> become הַגּ֜וֹי <S%H1471><s%> And it shall come to pass [that] the nation וְהַמַּמְלָכָ֗ה <S%H4467><s%> and kingdom אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> will not יַעַבְד֤וּ <S%H5647><s%> which will not serve אֹתוֹ֙ <S%H853><s%> אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נְבוּכַדְנֶאצַּ֣ר <S%H5019><s%> the same Nebuchadnezzar מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> the king בָּבֶ֔ל <S%H894><s%> of Babylon וְאֵ֨ת <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> and which לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> will not יִתֵּן֙ <S%H5414><s%> and that will not put אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> צַוָּאר֔וֹ <S%H6677><s%> their neck בְּעֹ֖ל <S%H5923><s%> under the yoke מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> of the king בָּבֶ֑ל <S%H894><s%> of Babylon בַּחֶרֶב֩ <S%H2719><s%> with the sword וּבָרָעָ֨ב <S%H7458><s%> and with the famine וּבַדֶּ֜בֶר <S%H1698><s%> and with the pestilence אֶפְקֹ֨ד <S%H6485><s%> will I punish עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> that הַגּ֤וֹי <S%H1471><s%> that nation הַהוּא֙ <S%H1931><s%> he נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until תֻּמִּ֥י <S%H8552><s%> until I have consumed אֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> בְּיָדֽוֹ׃ <S%H3027><s%> them by his hand

וְ֠אַתֶּם <S%H859><s%> you אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּשְׁמְע֨וּ <S%H8085><s%> Therefore hearken אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to נְבִיאֵיכֶ֜ם <S%H5030><s%> not ye to your prophets וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about קֹֽסְמֵיכֶ֗ם <S%H7080><s%> nor to your diviners וְאֶל֙ <S%H413><s%> about חֲלֹמֹ֣תֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H2472><s%> nor to your dreamers וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about עֹֽנְנֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H6049><s%> nor to your enchanters וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about כַּשָּׁפֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H3786><s%> nor to your sorcerers אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who הֵ֞ם <S%H1992><s%> like אֹמְרִ֤ים <S%H559><s%> which speak אֲלֵיכֶם֙ <S%H413><s%> to you לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> unto you saying לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> You will not תַעַבְד֖וּ <S%H5647><s%> Ye shall not serve אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king בָּבֶֽל׃ <S%H894><s%> of Babylon

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for שֶׁ֔קֶר <S%H8267><s%> a lie הֵ֖ם <S%H1992><s%> they נִבְּאִ֣ים <S%H5012><s%> For they prophesy לָכֶ֑ם לְמַ֨עַן <S%H4616><s%> order הַרְחִ֤יק <S%H7368><s%> unto you to remove you far אֶתְכֶם֙ <S%H853><s%> מֵעַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> from אַדְמַתְכֶ֔ם <S%H127><s%> from your land וְהִדַּחְתִּ֥י <S%H5080><s%> and that I should drive you out אֶתְכֶ֖ם <S%H853><s%> וַאֲבַדְתֶּֽם׃ <S%H6><s%> and ye should perish

וְהַגּ֗וֹי <S%H1471><s%> But the nations אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which יָבִ֧יא <S%H935><s%> that bring אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> צַוָּאר֛וֹ <S%H6677><s%> their neck בְּעֹ֥ל <S%H5923><s%> under the yoke מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> of the king בָּבֶ֖ל <S%H894><s%> of Babylon וַֽעֲבָד֑וֹ <S%H5647><s%> and serve וְהִנַּחְתִּ֤יו <S%H3240><s%> him those will I let remain still עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on אַדְמָתוֹ֙ <S%H127><s%> in their own land נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וַֽעֲבָדָ֖הּ <S%H5647><s%> and they shall till וְיָ֥שַׁב <S%H3427><s%> it and dwell בָּֽהּ׃

וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to צִדְקִיָּ֤ה <S%H6667><s%> also to Zedekiah מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king יְהוּדָה֙ <S%H3063><s%> of Judah דִּבַּ֔רְתִּי <S%H1696><s%> I spake כְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַדְּבָרִ֥ים <S%H1697><s%> according to all these words הָאֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying הָבִ֨יאוּ <S%H935><s%> Bring אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> צַוְּארֵיכֶ֜ם <S%H6677><s%> your necks בְּעֹ֣ל <S%H5923><s%> under the yoke מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> of the king בָּבֶ֗ל <S%H894><s%> of Babylon וְעִבְד֥וּ <S%H5647><s%> and serve אֹת֛וֹ <S%H853><s%> וְעַמּ֖וֹ <S%H5971><s%> him and his people וִֽחְיֽוּ׃ <S%H2421><s%> and live

לָ֤מָּה <S%H4100><s%> Why תָמ֙וּתוּ֙ <S%H4191><s%> Why will ye die אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> you וְעַמֶּ֔ךָ <S%H5971><s%> thou and thy people בַּחֶ֖רֶב <S%H2719><s%> by the sword בָּרָעָ֣ב <S%H7458><s%> by the famine וּבַדָּ֑בֶר֙ <S%H1698><s%> and by the pestilence כַּֽאֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> which דִּבֶּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> hath spoken יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> as the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַגּ֕וֹי <S%H1471><s%> against the nation אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> will not יַעֲבֹ֖ד <S%H5647><s%> that will not serve אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king בָּבֶֽל׃ <S%H894><s%> Babel

וְאַֽל־ <S%H408><s%> nay תִּשְׁמְע֞וּ <S%H8085><s%> Therefore hearken אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to דִּבְרֵ֣י <S%H1697><s%> not unto the words הַנְּבִאִ֗ים <S%H5030><s%> of the prophets הָאֹמְרִ֤ים <S%H559><s%> that speak אֲלֵיכֶם֙ <S%H413><s%> to you לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> unto you saying לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> You will not תַעַבְד֖וּ <S%H5647><s%> Ye shall not serve אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king בָּבֶ֑ל <S%H894><s%> of Babylon כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for שֶׁ֔קֶר <S%H8267><s%> a lie הֵ֖ם <S%H1992><s%> they נִבְּאִ֥ים <S%H5012><s%> for they prophesy לָכֶֽם׃

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> have not שְׁלַחְתִּים֙ <S%H7971><s%> For I have not sent נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> them saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וְהֵ֛ם <S%H1992><s%> they נִבְּאִ֥ים <S%H5012><s%> yet they prophesy בִּשְׁמִ֖י <S%H8034><s%> in my name לַשָּׁ֑קֶר <S%H8267><s%> a lie לְמַ֨עַן <S%H4616><s%> order הַדִּיחִ֤י <S%H5080><s%> that I might drive you out אֶתְכֶם֙ <S%H853><s%> וַאֲבַדְתֶּ֔ם <S%H6><s%> and that ye might perish אַתֶּ֕ם <S%H859><s%> you וְהַנְּבִאִ֖ים <S%H5030><s%> ye and the prophets הַֽנִּבְּאִ֥ים <S%H5012><s%> that prophesy לָכֶֽם׃

וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַכֹּהֲנִים֩ <S%H3548><s%> to the priests וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and to כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָעָ֨ם <S%H5971><s%> and to all this people הַזֶּ֜ה <S%H2088><s%> this דִּבַּ֣רְתִּי <S%H1696><s%> Also I spake לֵאמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> saying כֹּה֮ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָה֒ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אַֽל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּשְׁמְע֞וּ <S%H8085><s%> Hearken אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to דִּבְרֵ֣י <S%H1697><s%> not to the words נְבִֽיאֵיכֶ֗ם <S%H5030><s%> of your prophets הַֽנִּבְּאִ֤ים <S%H5012><s%> that prophesy לָכֶם֙ לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> unto you saying הִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold כְלֵ֧י <S%H3627><s%> Behold the vessels בֵית־ <S%H1004><s%> house יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD'S מוּשָׁבִ֥ים <S%H7725><s%> be brought again מִבָּבֶ֖לָה <S%H894><s%> from Babylon עַתָּ֣ה <S%H6258><s%> will now מְהֵרָ֑ה <S%H4120><s%> shall now shortly כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for שֶׁ֔קֶר <S%H8267><s%> a lie הֵ֖מָּה <S%H1992><s%> who נִבְּאִ֥ים <S%H5012><s%> for they prophesy לָכֶֽם׃

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּשְׁמְע֣וּ <S%H8085><s%> Hearken אֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H413><s%> to עִבְד֥וּ <S%H5647><s%> not unto them serve אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> the king בָּבֶ֖ל <S%H894><s%> of Babylon וִֽחְי֑וּ <S%H2421><s%> and live לָ֧מָּה <S%H4100><s%> Why תִֽהְיֶ֛ה <S%H1961><s%> become הָעִ֥יר <S%H5892><s%> wherefore should this city הַזֹּ֖את <S%H2063><s%> likewise חָרְבָּֽה׃ <S%H2723><s%> desolation
